name: Sergey Sirotkin
introduction: Sergey Olegovich Sirotkin (Russian:   , born August 27, 1995 in Moscow, Russia) is a Russian former racing driver who is currently a test driver for both the Renault and McLaren teams. From 2012 to 2014, he drove in Formula Renault 3.5, and from 2015 to 2017, he raced in the GP2 Series. From 2016 to 2017, he was a test driver for Renault. He made his Formula One debut with Williams in 2018,[1] and his car number is #35.[2]
